description: Works great but window and text are tiny and can not be resized. On 4k almost unreadable

I own a pair of Truke BTG1s, and have been looking for a GUI interface to control them on Linux for a long time! Will this app work, can I tweak some settings to make it work? My device is detected by the app, but I don't know which Samsung device to designate it as?
summary: Does this work with buds from other manufacturers?

description: A white window opens for a second and then closes. I tried downloading by using "flatpak install flathub me.timschneeberger.GalaxyBudsClient" as well but it also didn't launch that way.
installently connected and had the settings I needed. nice dark mode too
summary: works good for galaxy buds pro

description:
The software works flawlessly. I am now able to use active noice cancellation & ambient sounds with my linux system. 

There is no voice detection feature, like in the official versions of this app, but I don't care for that feature anyways.
summary: Works great w/ Fedora 38 and Buds 2 Pro!

description: Everything works as expected, just like the mobile app

I've been using it daily for the past year and it's never failed me, although there are some hiccups when I disconnect and reconnect with it not picking up my Buds Pro until I close and reopen the app. I'm excited to see this as a flatpak so I don't have to run it from the terminal every time. I noticed the version number is 4.5.2, whereas the newest release is 4.5.4, but that's not an issue because the changes aren't relevant to my use case.
summary: Does the job really well! There's no better alternative

description: the app dosent switch from my phone to my laptop when i try, i have to manually disconnect from my phone and them connect to my laptop.
Don't reallh have much to say, works super well :D
it wont suport samsung buds 2 pro
summary: its ok for the buds live

description: I have 2 BT radios. Ont that is plugged into a USB hub on the keyboard and one that is in the computer at a distance. I can connect the buds but the app refuses to connect consistently saying nothing is connected when clearly it is.
Funktioniert einwandfrei, zumindest für meine Galaxy Buds.
App does all one would like it to do. Even better than the original samsung app with the firmware updater tool and developer options available.
summary: Excellent App, great dessign, works flawlessly

description:
Casi que parece una aplicación oficial.
Hay algunas limitaciones, pero son más que nada culpa de la integración de los Buds a linux.

I've been using it for four months, works great!
Waiting for that sweet DE integration
